kDesc
Be the star quarterback, even if you've never scored a touchdown.\n\n Tackle your dreams with Double Time. [#Legal]
Devenez le plus grand des quarterbacks, même si vous n'avez jamais marqué un essai.\n\n Taclez vos rêves grâce à Double Time. [#Legal]
Sei der Star-Quarterback, selbst wenn du noch nie einen Touchdown gemacht hast.\n\n Verwirkliche deine Träume mit Double Time. [#Legal]
Diventa un famoso quarterback, anche se non hai mai segnato un touchdown.\n\n Placca i tuoi sogni con Double Time. [#Legal]
Conviértete en el quarterback estrella, aunque no hayas marcado nunca un touchdown.\n\n Ataca tus problemas con Double Time. [#Legal]
スターＱＢになろう、アメフト素人でタッチダウンした事がなくても。\n\n Double Timeで夢に向かってタックルだ [#Legal]
한 번도 터치다운을 해보지 못했어도 여기서는 스타 쿼터백이 될 수 있습니다.\n\n 더블타임과 함께 당신의 꿈을 향해 태클.[#Legal]
Be the star quarterback, even if you've never scored a touchdown.\n\n Tackle your dreams with Double Time. [#Legal]
就算你從來沒達陣，也能當個明星四分衛。\n\n Double Time讓你球夢成真。 [#Legal]
